item.title: Medium Blog
item.description: I post my technical writings on Medium. Check them out here.

item.title: About
item.description: Since a little kid I have always had a penchant towards technology and science. It was not too uncommon seeing me walking around with a full backpack of electronic gadgets, most of which didn’t work and were torn apart in what I call “science experiments”. Don’t confuse me with those spoiled kids who were regularly gifted ton of toys just to have them. Growing up in a traditional Chinese household I had to break ten just to get one new, all expenses paid with red envelopes given to me during Chinese New Year.
